movies.title: Superman
movies.description: James Gunn’s reboot follows Clark balancing reporter life and heroic duty as a new threat tests his ideals.

movies.title: Captain America: Brave New World
movies.description: Sam Wilson’s first solo mission as Captain America pits him against political machinations and deadly new enemies.

movies.title: Minecraft
movies.description: A live-action quest through a blocky world where unlikely heroes must stop the Ender Dragon from destroying everything.

movies.title: Wicked: For Good
movies.description: The saga concludes as Elphaba and Glinda’s fates collide in Oz, closing out the two-part musical adaptation.

movies.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
movies.description: Marvel’s first family enters the MCU in a retro-futuristic adventure against a cosmic menace.

movies.title: Tron: Ares
movies.description: A program crosses into the real world, forcing a high-velocity clash between humanity and sentient code.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.description: Live-action retelling of Hiccup and Toothless’ unlikely bond that reshapes Viking-dragon relations.

movies.title: Paddington in Peru
movies.description: Paddington returns to Peru for a family mystery that becomes his most heartwarming journey yet.

movies.title: M3GAN 2.0
movies.description: The rogue AI doll is back—smarter, scarier, and deadlier than ever.

movies.title: Snow White
movies.description: Disney’s live-action reimagining of the classic tale of a princess, a poisoned apple, and a kingdom reclaimed.
